mapper.select: SELECT * FROM book WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name} ,'%')
SELECT * FROM book WHERE stock_quantity=0 ORDER BY book_id desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT * FROM book WHERE stock_quantity!=0 ORDER BY book_id desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT writer_book_id FROM writer_book ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(writer_book_id, 4) AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT book_id FROM book ORDER BY book_id DESC LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT * FROM publisher ORDER BY name
SELECT publisher_id FROM publisher ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(publisher_id, 5) AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT * FROM writer ORDER BY name
SELECT writer_id FROM writer ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(writer_id, 5) AS UNSIGNED ) DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (publisher_id, category_large_id, category_medium_id, category_small_id, name, translator, original_price, discount_percent, discount_price, sale_price, release_date, table_of_content, description, isbn, stock_quantity, size, weight, page, image) VALUES (#{publisherId},#{categoryLargeId}, #{categoryMediumId}, #{categorySmallId},#{name},#{translator},#{originalPrice},#{discountPercent}, #{discountPrice},#{salePrice},#{releaseDate},#{tableOfContent},#{description},#{isbn}, #{stockQuantity},#{size},#{weight},#{page},#{image})

INSERT INTO publisher (publisher_id, name, president, biz_reg_no, main_address, detail_address, zip_code, phone_num, biz_area) VALUES (#{publisherId},#{name},#{president},#{bizRegNo},#{mainAddress},#{detailAddress},#{zipCode},#{phoneNum},#{bizArea})
INSERT INTO writer (writer_id, name, description, gender, nationality, nickname) VALUES (#{writerId},#{name},#{description},#{gender},#{nationality},#{nickname})
INSERT INTO writer_book(writer_book_id, writer_id, book_id) VALUES (#{writerBookId},#{writerId},#{bookId})
